'''Wilimar Bolger''' was a [[hobbits|hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Wilimar was the son of [[Wilibald Bolger]] and [[Prisca Baggins]]. Wilimar Bolger attended the [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Farewell Party]] of [[Bilbo Baggins]] in {{SR|1401}}.<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>
